channel.title: Hearts of Wulin (April)
channel.description:
![49c027bbly1fq1tbvna7mj20rs0fm7wh%20(2)|690x489](upload://xuwzjboa7EMLDFKsxzNpCgwaMQH.jpeg)
Get heroic. Romantic. Tragic. In the world of the Wulin, words are gold and the sweet burden of obligation ties its inhabitants to each other. Live out the dazzling, tragic, and sometimes farcical lives of martial heroes.
Sessions run for 3 hours. Attendance in all 5 sessions is recommended, though not required. We'll be using the X-Card, Lines and Veils, and the Open Door Policy.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play.
[date=2019-04-01 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] → [date=2019-04-01 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYNmpnO3ChcZW6rxdEa) [date=2019-04-08 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] → [date=2019-04-08 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYNmxVqXqIWDRzJ_x75) [date=2019-04-15 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] → [date=2019-04-15 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYNn4Ns4d8kO9Qq_317) [date=2019-04-22 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] → [date=2019-04-22 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYNnD4LIITGNKXcp6Ma) [date=2019-04-29 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] → [date=2019-04-29 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Toronto"] [Session 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYNnIldWxtB4KHrISy5)

Get heroic. Romantic. Tragic. In the world of the Wulin, words are gold and the sweet burden of obligation ties its inhabitants to each other. Live out the dazzling, tragic, and sometimes farcical lives of martial heroes.

Sessions run for 3 hours. Attendance in all 5 sessions is recommended, though not required. We’ll be using the X-Card, Lines and Veils, and the Open Door Policy.
